name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Camping With Friends Graphic T-Shirt - Women's
categories: Merino Sport 150 Camping With Friends Graphic
description: Camping with friends, it doesn’t get much better. Smartwool quick-drying Sport 150 material wicks moisture away from your body and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Its natural odor resistance lets you extend the gap between laundry days.Jersey knit merino wool with a polyester core is durable and keeps wool next to your skin.Fine gauge merino wool.Rated at UPF 20+ to block 93% of harsh UV.Flatlock finishing and offset seams add comfort while wearing a pack.Original artwork by Jonas Claesson.Regular fit.
